column4: すべてがわかりました。
column5: It's all clear to me now.

column4:
最強のはずだった複合銃士が、
なぜ思ったほどの力を
発揮しないのか。
column5: I see why the Multi-Gunslinger, the {ultimate Puppet}, just doesn't show as much power as I'd hoped...
column11: Why the Multi-Gunslinger which was supposed to be the ultimate mech, just doesn't exhibit as much power as I'd hoped...

column4:
つまり、
こういうことでしょう。
機能を盛り込みすぎた。
昔から、多芸は無芸といいます。
column5: As the old saying goes, a jack of all trades is the master of none.
column11: As the old saying goes, a jack of all trades is the master of none.

column4:
最強とは、何でもできること
ではない。
column5: Being the best isn't about being able to do everything.
column11: Being the best isn't about being able to do everything.

column4:
たった１つでいい。
極限まで高められた機能を
持つこと。
column5: It's focusing on one thing -- having a single feature maxed out to the highest possible limit.
column11: It's focusing on one thing, having a single feature maxed out to the highest possible limit.

column4: それが重要なのだと思います。
column5: I think that's the most important part.
column11: I think that's the most important part.

column4: この人形、器用貧乏ってやつか。
column5: So you're saying this Puppet is just like this {Jack} guy?
column11: This mech is just like that {Jack} guy, huh?

column4:
機能を増やしすぎると、コクピ
ットがゴチャゴチャになってし
まうこともわかりました。
column5: If you try to include too many features, the cockpit just becomes a huge disorganized mess.
column11: Now I understand that if you try to include too many features, the Cockpit just becomes one huge disorganised mess.

column4:
複合銃士をお売りしますから、
ぜひ一度、
操縦してみてください。
column5: I'll put the Multi-Gunslinger up for sale, so you should definitely give it a try, at least.
column11: We'll put the Multi-Gunslinger up for sale, so you should definitely give it a try at least.

column4:
扱いにくいとは思いますが……
もし使いこなせれば、
役に立つかもしれません。
column5: You might think it's too difficult to bother with...But if you're able to master it, I bet it'll come in handy.
column11: You might think it's too difficult to bother with... But if you're able to master it, I bet it'll come in handy.
